com.googlecode.aluminumproject.cache
Interface Cache

All Superinterfaces:
ConfigurationElement
All Known Implementing Classes:
MemoryCache
public interface Cache
extends ConfigurationElement

A cache for templates. Templates are stored under a key: the combination of the name of the template and the name of the parser that produced it.

Nested Class Summary
static class Cache.Key
          The key that cached templates are stored under.
 
Method Summary
 Template findTemplate(Cache.Key key)
          Finds a template by its key.
 void storeTemplate(Cache.Key key, Template template)
          Stores a template under a certain key.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.googlecode.aluminumproject.configuration.ConfigurationElement
initialise
 

Method Detail

storeTemplate

void storeTemplate(Cache.Key key,
                   Template template)
                   throws CacheException
Stores a template under a certain key. When a template had already been stored under the given key, it is replaced.

Parameters:
key - the key to store the template under
template - the template to store
Throws:
CacheException - when the cache is not available

findTemplate

Template findTemplate(Cache.Key key)
                      throws CacheException
Finds a template by its key. When this cache does not contain the given key, null is returned.

Parameters:
key - the key to find a template by
Returns:
the template with the given key or null if no template was stored under the key given
Throws:
CacheException - when the cache is not available
